Package com.hdmstuttgart.fluffybear.service

Class RecipeService

java.lang.Object
com.hdmstuttgart.fluffybear.service.RecipeService
@Service
public class RecipeService
extends java.lang.Object
Spring boot service for recipes.

  • Method Details

    • getAllRecipes

      public java.util.List<Recipe> getAllRecipes()
      Returns all recipes from the repository in a simple java list.
      Returns:
      the recipe list

    • getAllRecipesByFilter

      public java.util.List<Recipe> getAllRecipesByFilter​(boolean breakfast, boolean lunch, boolean dinner, boolean vegetarian, boolean vegan, boolean longTime, boolean shortTime)
      Applies a filter to all recipes and returns the list of the filtered recipes.
      Parameters:
      breakfast - indicating if recipe is for lunch.
      lunch - maximum time of the recipe in minutes.
      dinner - list of all possible categories for the recipe.
      vegetarian - indicating if the recipe is vegetarian.
      vegan - indicating if the recipe is vegan.
      Returns:
      the filtered list of recipes.

    • getOneRecipeByFilter

      public Recipe getOneRecipeByFilter​(boolean breakfast, boolean lunch, boolean dinner, boolean vegetarian, boolean vegan, boolean longTime, boolean shortTime)
      Applies a filter to all recipes and returns a single random recipe of the resulting subset.
      Parameters:
      breakfast - indicating if recipe is for lunch.
      lunch - maximum time of the recipe in minutes.
      dinner - list of all possible categories for the recipe.
      vegetarian - indicating if the recipe is vegetarian.
      vegan - indicating if the recipe is vegan.
      Returns:
      the filtered list of recipes.

    • getRecipe

      public Recipe getRecipe​(java.lang.Long id)
      Returns recipe object identified by a unique id.
      Parameters:
      id - which is used for identifying the recipe.
      Returns:
      the recipe

    • getRecipe

      public java.util.List<Recipe> getRecipe​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns recipe list identified by a name.
      Parameters:
      name - which is used for identifying the recipe.
      Returns:
      the list of recipes identified by name.

    • addRecipe

      public Recipe addRecipe​(Recipe recipe)
      Saves a recipe via the repository.
      Parameters:
      recipe - which will be saved.
      Returns:
      saved Recipe instance.

    • updateRecipe

      public void updateRecipe​(long id, Recipe recipe)
      Updates a recipe identified by an id.
      Parameters:
      id - which identifies the recipe which will be updated.
      recipe - which property values will update the old values.

    • deleteRecipe

      public void deleteRecipe​(long id)
      Deletes a recipe identified by an id.
      Parameters:
      id - which identifies the recipe which will be deleted.

    • deleteAll

      public void deleteAll()
      Deletes all recipes.
